reuze

Class ac_DomainRestoreInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ac_DomainRestoreInfo

  • public class ac_DomainRestoreInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides informations which might be useful for a caller of a constraint propagation algorithm. It maintains old domains for variables and provides means to restore the initial state of the CSP (before domain reduction started). Additionally, a flag indicates whether an empty domain has been found during propagation.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
